summary: Add new follower: Edvard Crullen a vampire in Frozen Hearth inn in Winterhold
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][u][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]DESCRIPTION
[/size][/color][/b][/u][b][color=#00ff00][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=4]
Adds new Vampire Follower, Edvard Crullen . He can be found in Frozen Hearth inn in Winterhold
he is a spellsword. wearing royal vampire armour set.
[u][color=#ff0000]REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC & APACHII SKY HAIR

INSTALATION
[/color][/u][color=#ff0000][color=#ffffff]Extract files to skyrim data folder[/color]
[/color][u][color=#ff0000]

[color=#00ffff]COMPATIBLE WITH UFO





[color=#1155Cc][color=#00ff00]CREDITS[/color][/color][/color][/color][/u]
[/size][/color][/size][/color][/b][size=3]
Apachii[/size][/center]
author: ardesio
